pli-tv-kd14:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.4_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.5_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.7_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.8_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asammukhībhūtānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.12_2: tesaṁ moghapurisānaṁ ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.13_0: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā asammukhībhūtānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.19_0: tajjanīyaṁ vā, niyassaṁ vā, pabbājanīyaṁ vā, paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā, ukkhepanīyaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.21_0: Adhammavādī puggalo adhammavādī sambahulā adhammavādī saṅgho.
pli-tv-kd14:1.1.22_0: Dhammavādī puggalo dhammavādī sambahulā dhammavādī saṅgho.
pli-tv-kd14:2.1.1_0: Adhammavādī puggalo dhammavādiṁ puggalaṁ saññāpeti nijjhāpeti pekkheti anupekkheti dasseti anudasseti—
pli-tv-kd14:2.1.2_0: ‘ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanaṁ, imaṁ gaṇhāhi, imaṁ rocehī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:2.1.3_0: Evañcetaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati, adhammena vūpasammati sammukhāvinayapatirūpakena.

pli-tv-kd14:4.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena jātiyā sattavassena arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.3_0: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ sabbaṁ tena anuppattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.4_0: Natthi cassa kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.5_0: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.7_0: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ sabbaṁ mayā anuppattaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.8_0: Natthi ca me kiñci uttarikaraṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.9_0: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ saṅghassa veyyāvaccaṁ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.10_0: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.11_0: “yannūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṁ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.3_0: “idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.5_0: Yaṁ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṁ, sabbaṁ mayā anuppattaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.6_0: Natthi ca me kiñci uttarikaraṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.7_0: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ saṅghassa veyyāvaccaṁ kareyyan’ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.9_0: ‘yannūnāhaṁ saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṁ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.10_0: Icchāmahaṁ, bhante, saṅghassa senāsanañca paññāpetuṁ bhattāni ca uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.12_0: Tena hi tvaṁ, dabba, saṅghassa senāsanañca paññapehi bhattāni ca uddisāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.13_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.2_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannatu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.5_0: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.7_1: saṅgho āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.10_0: Saṅgho āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.11_0: Yassāyasmato khamati āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa senāsanapaññāpakassa ca bhattuddesakassa ca sammuti,
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.13_0: Sammato saṅghena āyasmā dabbo mallaputto senāsanapaññāpako ca bhattuddesako ca.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.14_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.1_0: Sammato ca panāyasmā dabbo mallaputto sabhāgānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.2_0: Ye te bhikkhū suttantikā tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.4_0: Ye te bhikkhū vinayadharā tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.6_0: Ye te bhikkhū dhammakathikā tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.8_0: Ye te bhikkhū jhāyino tesaṁ ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.10_0: Ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesampi ekajjhaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.12_0: Yepi te bhikkhū vikāle āgacchanti tesampi tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā teneva ālokena senāsanaṁ paññapeti;
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.15_0: Te āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.17_0: Te āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.20_0: “amhākaṁ, āvuso dabba, gijjhakūṭe pabbate senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.22_0: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.23_0: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, vebhārapasse sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.24_0: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, sītavane sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre senāsanaṁ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.30_0: Amhākaṁ, āvuso, maddakucchimhi migadāye senāsanaṁ paññapehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.31_0: Tesaṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto tejodhātuṁ samāpajjitvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato purato gacchati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.32_0: Tepi teneva ālokena āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.33_0: Tesaṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.35_0: Tesaṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṁ senāsanaṁ paññapetvā punadeva veḷuvanaṁ paccāgacchati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū navakā ceva honti appapuññā ca.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.2_0: Yāni saṅghassa lāmakāni senāsanāni tāni tesaṁ pāpuṇanti lāmakāni ca bhattāni.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe manussā icchanti therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhisaṅkhārikaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ dātuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.7_0: Te pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā there bhikkhū pucchanti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.8_0: “tumhākaṁ, āvuso, bhattagge kiṁ ahosi, tumhākaṁ kiṁ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.10_0: “amhākaṁ, āvuso, sappi ahosi, telaṁ ahosi, uttaribhaṅgaṁ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saṅghassa catukkabhattaṁ deti niccabhattaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.3_0: aññe odanena pucchanti, aññe sūpena pucchanti, aññe telena pucchanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṁ svātanāya mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.5_0: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṁ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.6_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.7_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho kalyāṇabhattikaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.8_0: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.8_1: samuttejito sampahaṁsito āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.9_0: “kassa, bhante, amhākaṁ ghare svātanāya bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhan”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.10_0: “Mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ kho, gahapati, bhikkhūnaṁ tumhākaṁ ghare svātanāya bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.11_0: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.12_0: Kathañhi nāma pāpabhikkhū amhākaṁ ghare bhuñjissantīti gharaṁ gantvā dāsiṁ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.13_1: sve bhattikā āgacchanti te koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.14_0: “Evaṁ, ayyā”ti kho sā dāsī kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.2_0: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, amhākaṁ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṁ uddiṭṭhaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.3_0: sve amhe kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saputtadāro upatiṭṭhitvā parivisissati;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.5_0: Te teneva somanassena na cittarūpaṁ rattiyā supiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.6_0: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.7_0: Addasā kho sā dāsī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.8_0: disvāna koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.11_0: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho na tāva bhattaṁ siddhaṁ bhavissati yathā mayaṁ koṭṭhake nisīdāpiyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.12_0: Atha kho sā dāsī kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena upagañchi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.17_2: te koṭṭhake āsanaṁ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.20_0: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṁ agamāsi dabbassa mallaputtassa santike.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.21_0: Nissaṁsayaṁ kho mayaṁ dabbena mallaputtena gahapatino antare paribhinnā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.22_0: Te teneva domanassena na cittarūpaṁ bhuñjiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.23_0: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā ārāmaṁ gantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭisāmetvā
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.23_1: bahārāmakoṭṭhake saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdiṁsu tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyantā
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.1_0: Atha kho mettiyā bhikkhunī yena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.5_0: tatiyampi kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.10_0: “Tathā hi pana tvaṁ, bhagini, amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.12_0: “Sace kho tvaṁ, bhagini, iccheyyāsi, ajjeva bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāsāpeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.15_0: “Ehi tvaṁ, bhagini, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ evaṁ vadehi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.16_2: disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṁ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.20_1: ayyā”ti kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.21_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho mettiyā bhikkhunī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.22_2: disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṁ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.2_0: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathāyaṁ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.4_0: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.5_0: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathāyaṁ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.7_0: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.8_0: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathāyaṁ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.13_0: “Yatohaṁ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.17_0: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.18_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyaṁ bhikkhuniṁ nāsesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.19_0: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.20_0: “māvuso, mettiyaṁ bhikkhuniṁ nāsetha, na sā kiñci aparajjhati;
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.21_0: amhehi sā ussāhitā kupitehi anattamanehi cāvanādhippāyehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.22_0: “Kiṁ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.24_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.25_0: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.26_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.27_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.1_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ detu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.4_0: ‘ime maṁ, bhante, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.5_0: Sohaṁ, bhante, sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.8_0: ‘ime maṁ, bhante, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.9_0: Sohaṁ sativepullappatto tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.12_0: Ime mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.13_0: Āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.14_1: saṅgho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.17_0: Ime mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.18_0: Āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.19_0: Saṅgho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ deti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.20_0: Yassāyasmato khamati āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayassa dānaṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.25_0: Ime mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.26_0: Āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.27_0: Saṅgho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ deti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.28_0: Yassāyasmato khamati āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayassa dānaṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.30_0: Dinno saṅghena āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.31_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.11.2_3: tassa saṅgho sativinayaṁ deti dhammena samaggena—
pli-tv-kd14:4.11.3_0: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammikāni sativinayassa dānānī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena gaggo bhikkhu ummattako hoti, cittavipariyāsakato.
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.2_0: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.3_0: Bhikkhū gaggaṁ bhikkhuṁ ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codenti—
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.7_0: Tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.12_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.13_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū gaggaṁ bhikkhuṁ ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codessanti—
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.17_0: Tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.22_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:5.1.27_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho gaggassa bhikkhuno amūḷhassa amūḷhavinayaṁ detu.

pli-tv-kd14:5.2.5_0: Maṁ bhikkhū ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena āpattiyā codenti—

pli-tv-kd14:5.2.14_0: Sohaṁ, bhante, amūḷho saṅghaṁ amūḷhavinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.

pli-tv-kd14:5.2.23_0: Tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.24_0: Nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmi mūḷhena me etaṁ katan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.27_0: Sohaṁ amūḷho tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṁ amūḷhavinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.30_0: Ayaṁ gaggo bhikkhu ummattako ahosi cittavipariyāsakato.
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.31_0: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.

pli-tv-kd14:5.2.37_0: Nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmi, mūḷhena me etaṁ katan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.41_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho gaggassa bhikkhuno amūḷhassa amūḷhavinayaṁ dadeyya.

pli-tv-kd14:5.2.51_0: Nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmi mūḷhena me etaṁ katan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:5.2.55_0: Saṅgho gaggassa bhikkhuno amūḷhassa amūḷhavinayaṁ deti.

pli-tv-kd14:6.1.1_0: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, adhammikāni amūḷhavinayassa dānāni, tīṇi dhammikāni.

pli-tv-kd14:9.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saṅghamajjhe bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṁ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti,
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.7_0: Paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.9_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.13_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno salākaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:9.1.16_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:10.1.1_0: Dasayime, bhikkhave, adhammikā salākaggāhā, dasa dhammikā.
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.2_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.3_0: “kathañhi nāma upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānissati,
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.4_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:11.1.9_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho upavāḷassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ karotu.
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.2_3: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.4_0: Ayaṁ upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.5_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho upavāḷassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.8_0: Ayaṁ upavāḷo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.10_0: Yassāyasmato khamati upavāḷassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammassa karaṇaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:11.2.15_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:12.1.3_0: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammikāni tassapāpiyasikākammassa karaṇāni.
pli-tv-kd14:12.2.2_0: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchākataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:12.2.13_0: … adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:12.3.2.1_0: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchākataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:12.3.3_0: … dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.2_0: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.5_2: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.6_2: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.7_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.10_0: buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.11_2: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.12_0: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.15_0: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.17_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.18_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.19_0: Eko adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, eko ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, eko atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.22_0: eko buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, eko saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd14:12.4.23_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.

pli-tv-kd14:14.2.5_0: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhagaṁ—

pli-tv-kd14:14.2.9_0: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ—

pli-tv-kd14:14.5.23_5: tasseva pāpakassa anuvādamūlassa āyatiṁ anavassavāya paṭipajjeyyātha.
pli-tv-kd14:14.5.25_0: Evametassa pāpakassa anuvādamūlassa āyatiṁ anavassavo hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.5.29_0: sīlavipattiyā vā, ācāravipattiyā vā, diṭṭhivipattiyā vā, ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.5.33_0: sīlavipattiyā vā, ācāravipattiyā vā, diṭṭhivipattiyā vā, ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.5.39_0: Idhekacco dubbaco hoti, mammano, eḷagalavāco, yāya naṁ anuvadanti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.6.3_0: Atthāpatti kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato, na cittato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.6.4_0: Atthāpatti vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, na cittato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.6.5_0: Atthāpatti kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.6.6_0: Atthāpatti kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.6.7_0: Atthāpatti vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.6.8_0: Atthāpatti kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.2_0: Vivādādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.4_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū kusalacittā vivadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.6_0: duṭṭhullā āpattīti vā aduṭṭhullā āpattīti vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.7_0: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhagaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.10_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū akusalacittā vivadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.12_0: duṭṭhullā āpattīti vā aduṭṭhullā āpattīti vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.13_0: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhagaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.16_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū abyākatacittā vivadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.18_0: duṭṭhullā āpattīti vā aduṭṭhullā āpattīti vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.8.19_0: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhagaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.2_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.4_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ kusalacittā anuvadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.5_0: sīlavipattiyā vā, ācāravipattiyā vā, diṭṭhivipattiyā vā, ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.6_0: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.9_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ akusalacittā anuvadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.10_0: sīlavipattiyā vā, ācāravipattiyā vā, diṭṭhivipattiyā vā, ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.11_0: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.14_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ abyākatacittā anuvadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.15_0: sīlavipattiyā vā, ācāravipattiyā vā, diṭṭhivipattiyā vā, ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.9.16_0: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.10.4_0: Yaṁ jānanto sañjānanto cecca abhivitaritvā vītikkamo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.10.7_0: Yaṁ ajānanto asañjānanto acecca anabhivitaritvā vītikkamo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.11.2_0: Kiccādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusalaṁ, siyā akusalaṁ, siyā abyākataṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.12.1_0: Vivādo vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, vivādo no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no vivādo, adhikaraṇañceva vivādo ca.
pli-tv-kd14:14.12.6_0: duṭṭhullā āpattīti vā aduṭṭhullā āpattīti vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.12.7_0: Yaṁ tattha bhaṇḍanaṁ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhagaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.13.4_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ anuvadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.13.5_0: sīlavipattiyā vā, ācāravipattiyā vā, diṭṭhivipattiyā vā, ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.13.6_0: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.14.1_0: Āpatti āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, āpatti no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no āpatti, adhikaraṇañceva āpatti ca.
pli-tv-kd14:14.14.4_0: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.15.1_0: Kiccaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccaṁ no adhikaraṇaṁ, adhikaraṇaṁ no kiccaṁ, adhikaraṇañceva kiccañca.
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.3_0: Siyā vivādādhikaraṇaṁ ekaṁ samathaṁ anāgamma yebhuyyasikaṁ, ekena samathena sameyya—
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_2: bhāsitaṁ lapitaṁ tathāgatenāti vā abhāsitaṁ alapitaṁ tathāgatenāti vā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_3: āciṇṇaṁ tathāgatenāti vā anāciṇṇaṁ tathāgatenāti vā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_4: paññattaṁ tathāgatenāti vā apaññattaṁ tathāgatenāti vā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_6: lahukā āpattīti vā garukā āpattīti vā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_7: sāvasesā āpattīti vā anavasesā āpattīti vā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.8_8: duṭṭhullā āpattīti vā aduṭṭhullā āpattīti vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.15_0: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.18_0: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.21_0: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.23_0: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.1_2: bhikkhū na sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ tasmiṁ āvāse vūpasametuṁ, tehi,
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.2_2: bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchantā antarāmagge sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.8_0: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.11_0: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.14_0: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.16_0: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.1_2: bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ āgacchantā antarāmagge na sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ, tehi,
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.1_5: taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā āvāsikā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.2_0: ‘idaṁ kho, āvuso, adhikaraṇaṁ evaṁ jātaṁ, evaṁ samuppannaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.3_0: sādhāyasmantā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.4_5: āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.5_0: ‘iṅgha tumhe, āyasmanto, muhuttaṁ ekamantaṁ hotha, yāva mayaṁ mantemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.6_5: āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.7_0: ‘tena hi tumhe, āyasmanto, muhuttaṁ idheva tāva hotha, yāva mayaṁ mantemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.8_0: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mantayamānānaṁ evaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.9_0: ‘na mayaṁ sakkoma imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanenā’ti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.9_1: na taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi sampaṭicchitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.10_0: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ mantayamānānaṁ evaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.11_0: ‘sakkoma mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanenā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.12_0: Tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.13_2: amhākaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ yathājātaṁ yathāsamuppannaṁ ārocessatha,
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.13_3: yathā ca mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamessāma dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.15_2: amhākaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ yathājātaṁ yathāsamuppannaṁ ārocessatha,
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.15_3: yathā ca mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamessāma dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā na suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati,
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.16_0: Evaṁ supariggahitaṁ kho, bhikkhave, katvā āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ sampaṭicchitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.17_0: Tehi, bhikkhave, āgantukehi bhikkhūhi āvāsikā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.18_0: ‘yathājātaṁ yathāsamuppannaṁ mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āyasmantānaṁ ārocessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.19_0: Sace āyasmantā sakkonti ettakena vā ettakena vā antarena imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā suvūpasantaṁ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.20_0: Evaṁ mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āyasmantānaṁ niyyādessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.21_0: No ce āyasmantā sakkonti ettakena vā ettakena vā antarena imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ dhammena vinayena
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.21_2: na mayaṁ imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āyasmantānaṁ niyyādessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.23_2: katvā āgantukehi bhikkhūhi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ niyyādetabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.29_0: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.1_2: bhikkhūhi tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.3_1: pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī,
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.4_1: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.4_3: dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.5_0: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.6_0: vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṁhīro;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.7_0: paṭibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike assāsetuṁ saññāpetuṁ nijjhāpetuṁ pekkhetuṁ pasādetuṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.13_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṁ bhikkhuṁ ubbāhikāya sammannituṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.2_0: Paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.4_0: Amhākaṁ imasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.5_1: saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṁ sammanneyya ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.8_0: Amhākaṁ imasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.9_0: Saṅgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṁ sammannati ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.10_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhuno sammuti ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.12_0: Sammato saṅghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhu ubbāhikāya imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.13_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.21.1_2: bhikkhū sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:14.21.6_0: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.1_2: bhikkhūhi tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne tatrāssa bhikkhu dhammakathiko,
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.1_5: so atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati,
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.1_6: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.4_0: Imassa neva suttaṁ āgataṁ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.5_0: So atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.6_1: itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.7_2: bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.12_0: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.1_2: bhikkhūhi tasmiṁ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne tatrāssa bhikkhu dhammakathiko,
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.1_5: so atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati,
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.1_6: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.4_0: Imassa suttañhi kho āgataṁ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.5_0: So atthaṁ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṁ paṭibāhati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.6_1: itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.7_2: bhikkhū taṁ bhikkhuṁ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametuṁ,
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.12_0: evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.1_2: bhikkhū na sakkonti taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṁ, tehi,
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.3_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametuṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.7_0: Paṭhamaṁ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.9_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.13_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno salākaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.16_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.18_0: Yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.25_0: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.28_0: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.31_0: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.34_0: Yā yebhuyyasikākammassa kiriyā karaṇaṁ upagamanaṁ ajjhupagamanaṁ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.36_0: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā evaṁ jātaṁ evaṁ samuppannaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.4_0: assosuṁ kho amukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā therā viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.4_1: mātikādharā paṇḍitā viyattā medhāvino lajjino kukkuccakā sikkhākāmā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.5_0: Te ce therā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyyuṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā te there etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.7_0: “idaṁ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṁ evaṁ jātaṁ, evaṁ samuppannaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.8_1: therā imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.10_0: yathā sāvatthiyā saṅghena adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamitaṁ tathā suvūpasantanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.14_0: assosuṁ kho amukasmiṁ kira āvāse tayo therā viharanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.16_0: eko thero viharati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.17_0: So ce thero imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasameyya dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.18_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā taṁ theraṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.19_0: “idaṁ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṁ evaṁ jātaṁ, evaṁ samuppannaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.20_1: thero imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasametu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.24_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū asantuṭṭhā sāvatthiyā saṅghassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.1_0: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ saññattiyā tayo salākaggāhe—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.4_0: Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā salākāyo vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvā ekameko bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.13_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, gūḷhako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.15_0: Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā ekamekassa bhikkhuno upakaṇṇake ārocetabbaṁ—

pli-tv-kd14:14.26.28_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, vivaṭako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.3_0: sammukhāvinayena ca, sativinayena ca, amūḷhavinayena ca, tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.10_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.11_0: Tassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.13_0: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.16_0: Sohaṁ, bhante, sativepullappatto saṅghaṁ sativinayaṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.21_0: Bhikkhū itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.23_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.26_0: Bhikkhū itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.28_0: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayaṁ deti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.29_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayassa dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.33_0: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.34_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.

pli-tv-kd14:14.27.46_0: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.7_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ummattako hoti cittavipariyāsakato.
pli-tv-kd14:14.28.8_0: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ hoti bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.

pli-tv-kd14:14.28.23_0: Tena me ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhāciṇṇaṁ bhāsitaparikkantaṁ.

pli-tv-kd14:14.29.7_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ saṅghamajjhe garukāya āpattiyā codeti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.8_0: ‘saratāyasmā evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.10_0: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, sarāmi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.12_1: yadi sarasi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā,

pli-tv-kd14:14.29.15_0: Sarāmi ca kho ahaṁ, āvuso, evarūpiṁ appamattikaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.17_1: yadi sarasi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.19_0: ‘imañhi nāmāhaṁ, āvuso, appamattikaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā apuṭṭho paṭijānissāmi.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.20_0: Kiṁ panāhaṁ evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.22_0: ‘imañhi nāma tvaṁ, āvuso, appamattikaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā apuṭṭho na paṭijānissasi.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.23_0: Kiṁ pana tvaṁ evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitvā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.24_1: yadi sarasi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.26_0: ‘sarāmi kho ahaṁ, āvuso, evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.27_0: Davā me etaṁ vuttaṁ, ravā me etaṁ vuttaṁ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.28_0: nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmi evarūpiṁ garukaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjitā, pārājikaṁ vā pārājikasāmantaṁ vā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.29_0: Tassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kātabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.33_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe garukāya āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno avajānitvā paṭijānāti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.29.34_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ kareyya.

pli-tv-kd14:14.33.35_0: Sace mayaṁ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṁ kāressāma,
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.35_1: siyāpi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṁvatteyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.36_0: Ahaṁ yā ceva imesaṁ āyasmantānaṁ āpatti,
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.37_0: Yassāyasmato khamati amhākaṁ imāsaṁ āpattīnaṁ saṅghamajjhe tiṇavatthārakena desanā,
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.39_0: Desitā amhākaṁ imā āpattiyo saṅghamajjhe tiṇavatthārakena,
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.40_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.52_0: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.55_0: Yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, ubho sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.58_0: Yā tiṇavatthārakassa kammassa kiriyā karaṇaṁ upagamanaṁ ajjhupagamanaṁ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.33.60_0: Evaṁ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṁ paṭiggāhako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṁ pācittiyaṁ;
